S.FORM: 桑德羅·波提切利(Sandro Botticelli；Alessandro Filipepi,1445年3月1日—1510年5月17日)是15 ". San-te-low.Po-ti-cye-li "Sandro Botticelli；Alessandro Filipepi, 1445 a mihcaan 3 a bulad 1 a demiad katukuh 1510 a mihcaan 5 a bulad 17 a demiad" u 15 a lasubu a mihcaan tu sazikuzay ci Bow-low-lun-sa u singanganay nu mikulitay, Ow-cow u cumelakay nu nalimaan a misulitay saayaway a ziday ni Bow-low-lun-sa u zazikuzayay tu nu mikulitay a tademaw. malilid ni Ni-te-lan a nikulita tu nu tademaway, ci Pow-ti-cye-li nu I-ta-liay nu mapatayay a nikuliday tu nu tademaw. u singanganay nu situngusay a nikulitan "lalud" atu "kalecuhan ni Wiy-na-s". milawat tu nikauzipan 生平經歷 桑德羅·波提切利,原名Alessandro Filipepi , . San-te-low.Po-ti-cye-li , nau ngangan Alessandro Filipepi "Ya-li-san-te-low.Bey-li-pey-piy" "Po-ti-cye-li u pacimi a ngangan niza, zuma a ngangan, u imim "adidi'ay a bakici. Po-ti-cye-li nilecuhan i I-Ta-li Bow-low-lun-sa hanu limaan misangaay a kusi tu cayay katalakaw ku nilaculan nu labuay a luma'. . saayaway aci Ma-suo.Bey-ni-ku-ay-la maladay minanam, misanga' tu kim ging a gazali, zikuz mala ni Bey-li-pu.Li-pi nu micudaday, u sakay pacuayay ni Li-pi, pahabay ciniza tu tatamaan a wawa ni Li-pu ci Pow-pi-li-po.nuo. Po-ti cye-li hina madiput ni Mey-ti-ci a lalumaan atu cabay nu heni amin. . uyni kalalitin tu cence atu lalangawan u sasangaan sasilitan niza u ahebalay. i 1481 a mihcaan, Pow-ti-cye-li matakus tayza i Lu-ma mikuli tu cabengay a kuli, uyni dada' ku sapiliyas niza tu Bow-low-sa taza i hekal mikulit. sakukamu ci Pow-ti-cye-li namakay 15 a lasubu a mihcaan 90 a zidayan a malingatu mikilul tu wayway "ni Sa-wa-nay-low-la", i sazikuzay niza a mihcaan ni kulitan tu nu tinsikiway a matineng, u sazikuzay a nikulitan niza nayay ku nipakazali a waway, naka mutesek ku pikilul tu nu kiwkay.i 15 lasubu a mihcaan 80 a ziday atu 90 a zidayan, ci Pow-ti-vy nu Bow-low-lun-sa nu singanganay tu kucungay. mahapinang ku nu kiwkayay sibalucu'ay tu nu tademaw, matumes ku nu tademaway a angil. zazikuzay nu mihcaan nikulitan yadah macunus ku nu kasumamaday a nakamuan a kungku mala u sasulitan, tada mialaay tu nu kasumamadan nu Si-la atu Low-ma tu nakamuan nu babalaki a sasulitan. kapah ku waway , salungan, damsay kahemekan. . u micidekay sa yadah ku piyung niza tu nu kiwkayay mabidang tu ku zumaay a kiwkay a sasulitan, sibalucu' sa amikulit tu nayay ku zikuz a tademaw, sakay anuaya a nikulitan tabaki ku nikalilid tu '"lalud" atu "kalecuhan ni Wi-na-s" u tanengay amaazih ku wayway nu nikulitan tu tungusa nikulitan niza. ciniza sa nu Ow-cow nu saayaway nu kacumelakan nu nalimaan a nisulitan u wayway ci Boe-low-lun-sa nu nikulitay tu sazikuzayay tu nu mikulitay a tademaw.1470年, . 1470 a mihcaan, sakaku satu ciniza, patizeng tu pisakakawawan tu nu uzaip a pikulitan, dadawaw a saka namuhan nu lumaay ni Mey-ti-ci, yadah ku piciwmung cinizaan tu nikulitan. atu icelangay nu lumaay ni Mey-ti-ci mahiza tu kapah ku kacacayat u mikulitay madiput tu nu cence, a siaca ku nikulitan. namahini miawas tu kacacayat nuynian, ci Pow-ti-cye-te makatiyung tu Bow-low-lun-sa nu kakitaan a syakay atu singanganay nu nalimaan misulitay, mitiyung tu mahicahcaay a tineng, padas tu aazihan, mala u kucungay niza u micidakay kapahay ku nalimaan, mukelatay tabaki tanektek, salungan mukelat kulikulitan u bacu nu kakitaan.

桑德羅·波提切利(Sandro Botticelli；Alessandro Filipepi,1445年3月1日—1510年5月17日)是15 ". San-te-low.Po-ti-cye-li "Sandro Botticelli；Alessandro Filipepi, 1445 a mihcaan 3 a bolad 1 a demiad katokoh 1510 a mihcaan 5 a bolad 17 a demiad" o 15 a lasobo a mihcaan to sazikozay ci Bow-low-lon-sa o singanganay no mikolitay, Ow-cow o comelakay no nalimaan a misolitay saayaway a ziday ni Bow-low-lon-sa o zazikozayay to no mikolitay a tademaw. malilid ni Ni-te-lan a nikolita to no tademaway, ci Pow-ti-cye-li no I-ta-liay no mapatayay a nikoliday to no tademaw. o singanganay no sitongosay a nikolitan "lalod" ato "kalecohan ni Wiy-na-s". milawat to nikaozipan 生平經歷 桑德羅·波提切利,原名Alessandro Filipepi , . San-te-low.Po-ti-cye-li , nao ngangan Alessandro Filipepi "Ya-li-san-te-low.Bey-li-pey-piy" "Po-ti-cye-li o pacimi a ngangan niza, zoma a ngangan, o imim "adidi'ay a bakici. Po-ti-cye-li nilecohan i I-Ta-li Bow-low-lon-sa hano limaan misangaay a kosi to cayay katalakaw ko nilacolan no laboay a loma'. . saayaway aci Ma-soo.Bey-ni-ko-ay-la maladay minanam, misanga' to kim ging a gazali, zikoz mala ni Bey-li-po.Li-pi no micodaday, o sakay pacoayay ni Li-pi, pahabay ciniza to tatamaan a wawa ni Li-po ci Pow-pi-li-po.noo. Po-ti cye-li hina madipot ni Mey-ti-ci a lalomaan ato cabay no heni amin. . oyni kalalitin to cence ato lalangawan o sasangaan sasilitan niza o ahebalay. i 1481 a mihcaan, Pow-ti-cye-li matakos tayza i Lo-ma mikoli to cabengay a koli, oyni dada' ko sapiliyas niza to Bow-low-sa taza i hekal mikolit. sakokamo ci Pow-ti-cye-li namakay 15 a lasobo a mihcaan 90 a zidayan a malingato mikilol to wayway "ni Sa-wa-nay-low-la", i sazikozay niza a mihcaan ni kolitan to no tinsikiway a matineng, o sazikozay a nikolitan niza nayay ko nipakazali a waway, naka motesek ko pikilol to no kiwkay.i 15 lasobo a mihcaan 80 a ziday ato 90 a zidayan, ci Pow-ti-vy no Bow-low-lon-sa no singanganay to kocongay. mahapinang ko no kiwkayay sibaloco'ay to no tademaw, matomes ko no tademaway a angil. zazikozay no mihcaan nikolitan yadah maconos ko no kasomamaday a nakamoan a kongko mala o sasolitan, tada mialaay to no kasomamadan no Si-la ato Low-ma to nakamoan no babalaki a sasolitan. kapah ko waway , salongan, damsay kahemekan. . o micidekay sa yadah ko piyong niza to no kiwkayay mabidang to ko zomaay a kiwkay a sasolitan, sibaloco' sa amikolit to nayay ko zikoz a tademaw, sakay anoaya a nikolitan tabaki ko nikalilid to '"lalod" ato "kalecohan ni Wi-na-s" o tanengay amaazih ko wayway no nikolitan to tongosa nikolitan niza. ciniza sa no Ow-cow no saayaway no kacomelakan no nalimaan a nisolitan o wayway ci Boe-low-lon-sa no nikolitay to sazikozayay to no mikolitay a tademaw.1470年, . 1470 a mihcaan, sakako sato ciniza, patizeng to pisakakawawan to no ozaip a pikolitan, dadawaw a saka namohan no lomaay ni Mey-ti-ci, yadah ko piciwmong cinizaan to nikolitan. ato icelangay no lomaay ni Mey-ti-ci mahiza to kapah ko kacacayat o mikolitay madipot to no cence, a siaca ko nikolitan. namahini miawas to kacacayat noynian, ci Pow-ti-cye-te makatiyong to Bow-low-lon-sa no kakitaan a syakay ato singanganay no nalimaan misolitay, mitiyong to mahicahcaay a tineng, padas to aazihan, mala o kocongay niza o micidakay kapahay ko nalimaan, mokelatay tabaki tanektek, salongan mokelat kolikolitan o baco no kakitaan.
